title: Junior Java Developer - On-site Only
description:
We're seeking a Junior Java Developer to join our team at our New York office. This is an on-site position requiring daily office attendance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Maintain legacy Java applications
- Write code using Java 8 and Spring Framework
- Fix bugs in existing codebase
- Attend daily stand-ups in person

Required Skills:
- 1-2 years of Java development experience
- Knowledge of Spring Framework
- Willingness to work on-site full-time in New York
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science

Note: This position requires you to be in our New York office Monday through Friday, 9am-6pm. No remote work options available.

Our tech stack is primarily Java 8, Spring, Oracle Database, and on-premise servers. We value stability and maintaining our existing systems.
company_info: LegacyCorp is a traditional enterprise software company specializing in on-premise solutions for financial institutions.
